copyright: Â© 2025 Tesseract Project. All rights reserved.

scripts.dev-linux:staging: cross-env NODE_ENV=staging ELECTRON_DISABLE_SANDBOX=1 electron-vite dev --mode staging
scripts.dev-linux:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production ELECTRON_DISABLE_SANDBOX=1 electron-vite dev --mode production
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck:node && npm run typecheck:web
scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run typecheck && electron-vite build
scripts.build:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run typecheck && electron-vite build --mode development
scripts.build:staging: cross-env NODE_ENV=staging npm run typecheck && electron-vite build --mode staging
scripts.dist-all: npm run dist-win && npm run dist-linux && npm run dist-mac
scripts.dist-all:dev: npm run dist-win:dev && npm run dist-linux:dev && npm run dist-mac:dev
scripts.dist-all:staging: npm run dist-win:staging && npm run dist-linux:staging && npm run dist-mac:staging
scripts.dist-win: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run build && electron-builder --win --x64 && node scripts/package-build.cjs windows pre
scripts.dist-win:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run build:dev && electron-builder --win --x64 && node scripts/package-build.cjs windows dev
scripts.dist-win:staging: cross-env NODE_ENV=staging npm run build:staging && electron-builder --win --x64 && node scripts/package-build.cjs windows stg
scripts.dist-mac: cross-env NODE_ENV=production ./scripts/fix-mac-build.sh && npm run build && electron-builder --mac pkg --x64 && electron-builder --mac pkg --arm64 && node scripts/package-build.cjs macos pre
scripts.dist-mac:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development ./scripts/fix-mac-build.sh && npm run build:dev && electron-builder --mac pkg --x64 && electron-builder --mac pkg --arm64 && node scripts/package-build.cjs macos dev
scripts.dist-mac:staging: cross-env NODE_ENV=staging ./scripts/fix-mac-build.sh && npm run build:staging && electron-builder --mac pkg --x64 && electron-builder --mac pkg --arm64 && node scripts/package-build.cjs macos stg
scripts.clean: rimraf dist out && rimraf node_modules/.cache/electron && rimraf node_modules/.cache/electron-builder
